Outcomes

üìä Project Reports

Comprehensive reports documenting project outcomes, methodologies, and findings.

1. Report on Survey Experiment

The report presents the findings of a survey conducted to explore how social media content influences public beliefs and engagement with climate change issues.

November 2024

2. Report on Climate Lobbying Model

This report presents the development and insights of a novel opinion dynamics model with the integration of lobbyong activity and the human behavioural biases.

November 2024

3. Report on Climate Lobbying and Opinions

The report contains a detailed data analysis related to climate lobbying and the public debate on climate issues.

May 2024

üìù Scientific Articles

Peer-reviewed publications and research articles in academic journals and conferences.

1. Published Article on Climate Lobbying in Italy

"Composition and Determinants of Corporate Climate Lobbying: Evidence From Italy"

Corporate Social Responsibility and Environmental Management

This paper maps who lobbies on climate in Italy, how much they spend, and what drives participation in EU climate policy meetings.

September 2025

2. Published a Preprint Article on the Lobbying Opinion Dynamics Model

"Navigating the Lobbying Landscape: Insights from Opinion Dynamics Models"

Pre-print ArXiv

The work introduces a new model of opinion dynamics with behavioural bias where lobbyists can implement complex strategies using a finite budget.

July 2025

üíª Source Code

Open-source code repositories, software tools, and technical implementations.

1. Published Almondo Model Web Application

üîó View on GitHub

TypeScript

Open-source web-application for easily connetting with the simulation model of the diffusion of influence across a network with the influence of lobbyists.

January 2026

2. Published Almondo Model code

üîó View on GitHub

Python

Open-source library for simulate the diffusion of influence across a network with the influence of lobbyists.

September 2025
